thread.section_title: Grand Imperial - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: I expected mlre
thread.title_full: I expected mlre - Review of Grand Imperial, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: jazzyboyjeff
title: I expected mlre
text: Pretty subpar service .. everything and the service (staff, food, internet) was just slow. Hotel was humongous from the outside but once you enter you begin to notice how eirie it is on the inside. If you're just looking for a bed and breakfast and nothing more then it's better than most places you would find in Kampala. However if you wanted something more...
